text: E'ina hanuge'za Israeli vahe'mo'za Nagrikura Ra Anumzana tagri Anumza mani'ne hu'za ke'za antahiza hugahaze. Na'ankure Nagra ha' vahe huzmantoge'za eme zamahe'za zamavare'za vu'za kumazmirega kina ome huzmantetazage'na ete zamavare'na mopazmire e'noe. Hagi magore hu'na magomofona ha' vahe kumatega atresugeno kinafina omanigahie.
